name: Paul Torka
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I've been working mostly with JavaScript since I started my career as a programmer roughly 7 years ago. So I've been using technologies from jQuery/Mobile to react and Angular 2/4 + TypeScript and always felt better having tests by me side.
what_can_i_contribute: I like to discuss about TDD and want to learn how to convince a customer to use this methodology.
